attributes.action: refer all MP's who have made fraudulent expenses claims to the crown prosecution service
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition is forwarded to No.10 to give the public a voice that needs to be heard, fraudulent claims for expenses other than legitimate allowances should be submitted/referred to the CPS for investigation and subsequent prosecution of those involved.

rejection.details: The PM cannot instruct the police and CPS in this way.  Anyone can refer a matter to the police for investigation and they have the discretion whether to investigate the matter or not.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
